title: Dear diary
creator_credit: David Shepard, Debra Franco and Copperfield Films
brief_description: Companion film to “Am I normal?” Raising issues and answering questions relating to female puberty, in a humorous and entertaining manner. Provides information on body changes, maturation, peer pressure and self-image. TEACHER PREVIEW RECOMMENDED.
